title: Paired Sources African Women and Islam Q1

content.prompt: In Source 1 the author’s discussion of “respectable married women” most directly reflects which of the following continuities in the Islamic world?

choices.label: Islamic teachings continued to encourage tolerance of other religious groups.
Islamic teachings continued to encourage women to attend religious schools.
Islamic teachings continued to emphasize traditional male dominance.
Islamic teachings continued to emphasize the connection between political and religious authority.

topic.text: 1.2: Developments in Dar al-Islam from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
